column5: Will be featured on discovery Channel tomorrow night between 7 and 8.  http://www.gizmag.com/ice-auger-go-kart/35451/

and damn hard on the motor too

and damn hard on the motor too  Not if you use a dirt drilling auger motor.  Think outside the box.  I have no need for a gas ice auger,remember? Oh wait,you used yours didnt you yesterday.      YUP,IM A SMART
